venue.address_1: 33 Stanhope St. (in the alley behind Mistrale between Clarendon and Berkely and Columbus)
venue.name: Brahmin

item.description: Social Sundays is a hit. We’ll be back next on January 29th and then on February 12th for our special Valentine’s Day brunch party. The $3 mimosas and screwdrivers quickly turned to shots which quickly turned to dancing. And the networking was in full swing as a few people got new job leads. Guests will be enticed by a delicious brunch menu as DJ Chris Roxx spins an infectious playlist. The lights will be dimmed, the shades will be closed, corks will be popping and we’ll be featuring $3 screwdrivers as well as a fresh brunch food menu. Tired of the same old, same old brunch scene in Boston? We’re flipping the switch and keeping the weekend going on Sunday. This brunch is not for the conservative or the weary. No kids, no chores, no errands, no laundry…come ready to party, forget about real life for the afternoon. Grab your friends and check out Boston’s new hot scene as the weather gets cold. This is a truly unique experience where dancing on tables is encouraged. Come on down and see us. As seen in Stuff Magazine, Yelp, livetoeatfood and Urban Daddy. Reservations not required but encouraged. Please call 617-723-3131 to make yours http://crawlinboston....
item.name: Brunch Party
